reviews.review_msg: She was my TA as well as lecturer, and I liked the tutorial but her grading was very hard. She has high and specific standards, but due to the courses I'm taking this term I'm actually glad she pushed me so much to improve my writing. The course overall was ok but I only liked a couple of the books. It was much harder than i thought it would be.

Her lectures were extremely boring. Most of the time, I felt like she was stretching some of the content she was discussing. (But at least she's passionate about the subject - I personally didn't feel engaged though).
Lectures not necessary to attend, seemed very interested in the topics though.. Just attend tutorials and read the stories! Grade all depends on the TA.

She assigns unrealistic readings, sometimes over 200 pages a week. Her lectures are really long and overly specific so it is hard to apply what she tells you to your assignments. She goes on many tangents during lecture as well. She is tough but willing to help.

Honestly, don't take this class!! By the end you will be crying... her final exam may actually make kids cry. Her teaching is nothing special and she basically wants you to memorize the text to answer any of her final exam questions. Not a fair representation of how much you know.

Be ready to read throughout the entire semester. Her lectures are dry and feel like you will die of old age in there. She is nice but can get hard to listen to after a long time. It is easy to get confused in her class; she tends to go off track multiple times. Overall, I would not take this class again.

Hard Marker (like hard for first year)  Boring Lectures (don't learn anything in it) Don't recommend Missed a lecture  Had to read a long book (David Copperfield) Please save yourself and don't take this class with her

Her lectures are boring and not useful at all. If you decide to skip lectures,just remember to pick someone else's tutorial, not her own. Your marker is your tutor, and all tutor are actually having highly independent standards and tastes. This makes lectures rather unimportant, unless you picked the one held by herself.
Very high expectations, and very opinionated. Too much material for a full-time student, prof missed lectures.

Hardest marker ever. This class will ruin your self-esteem when it comes to writing essays and exams. She tries to be funny, but she's completely horrible. Her jokes suck! Avoid this prof if you don't want to receive bad marks - seriously.
She's boring

I thought she was a fantastic prof! Tried her best making leactures interesting. However, I think your TA is your best bet to get a good mark! My TA was awesome so I got quite a good mark. Avoid her tutorial. I would take her class again! Exams are very straight forward :)
Do not ever take her class! She is unfair and her lectures are useless and irrelevant!

Professor P.D. is by far one of the nicest teachers I have ever had in SFU. She can relate to you on any level and she's always willing to help. Attending her lectures can be useful if you want to understand more about the books but in the end, you don't get marks when you mention something on your test that was already said in class/tutorial.

I'd like to take the chance to say she is quite possibly one of my favourite professors here at SFU. She's very clear on the materials that are needed and her explanations are easy to follow. If you have the chance, never hesitate to take her class!!
amazing prof. if you give a damn about university, and actually try to learn she is awesome prof who caters to those students! I wish she could teach upper division English courses!

DONOT TAKE HER CLASS! I think she payed the students below to write those comments. She is horrible. If you want to do horribly bad in english then feel free to take her class. I have never hated english more than this.

She is very confused as to whether she is teaching intro to FICTION or First Nation Studies. I have learned nothing about Fiction as a form, and a lot about First Nations. Super important, interesting topic- but I did not sign up for it. I really respect her as a prof, but the course material is not okay.
makes you buy too many books. also we looked at a native comic book done in a japanese style this semester. not exactly english literature. talked too much about her race, nobody really cares.

There were 2 essays and one presentation with short story readings each week so altogether it's not a lot of work. The marking is fair and go to your TA to discuss your thesis before you start. Sophie is very nice prof that tries though her lectures are boring.

Happy to never take a class with her again. Lecture is a painful hour of listening to her opinion on boring short stories instead of teaching things that will actually benefit us. Workload is fair as are essays. Talk to your TA about your thesis statement for the essay before handing it in to make sure you do well. Sum: try to get a different prof
